snippet.title: Savant Ascent Trailer #3 - Void Update
snippet.description:
Savant - Ascent is available for $1.99 on Steam(PC, Mac, Linux), Apple's AppStore(iPhone/iPad) and Google Playstore(Android).

This is the Void Update, a free expansion to the game!
+ New levels and soundtracks/powerups.
+ New enemies and a powerful boss.
+ Added stage selection and achievements screens.
+ Increased resolution support to 1920x1200 for PC/Mac/Linux.

Visit http://www.savantgame.com or follow us on: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DPadStudio
Twitter: https://twitter.com/dpadstudio
